Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Health > Fitness > Diet and Weight Loss > How much weight can you lose by exercising? How much weight can you lose by exercising? In: Diet and Weight Loss , Exercise [ Edit categories ]
Answer: Actually When You Exercise you can loose you target weight goal. It Just depends on how often you exercising and how long.

Relevant answers:
How much weight do you lose weight from not eating? Oddly not too much (at first anyway). Your body goes into starvation mode and conserves energy anyway that it can. When you do eat again, the body will pack most of that away as fat because it... How much weight do you lose in an hour? This varies from individual to individual. We all have what is called a NEAT level (non-exercise activity thermogenesis) that includes activities such as fidgeting, the energy needed to support our... Why can you not lose weight despite exercising ? You need to do more than exercising, even though it's a crutial element you also might need to change your diet. If your eating fatty, greasy, or sugary foods then exercising isn't going to help a... How much weight do bulimics lose ? They lose so much weight that they get close to dying. If you want an exact amount of how much weight they lose, well that depends on the person and how often they do it. How much weight will you lose if you fast? Fasting is not very effective. You dont lose any fat, but you do lose muscle tissue. your body stores the fat and when you begin to eat again, your body puts that fat on the fat you stored from...
